sentences.en: " Yea, his honourable worship is within.
a long and honourable career in government
sentences.cn: 长期而光荣的从政生涯

sentences.en: An honourable death is better than a disgraceful life.
Carrington did the honourable thing and resigned.
sentences.cn: 卡林顿作出了令人敬佩的举动，辞了职。

sentences.en: He is descended from an honourable family.
He is the most honourable of men.
sentences.cn: 他是品行最为高尚的人.

sentences.en: He's a thoroughly decent ( ie honourable ) man.
Honour makes a great part of the reward of all honourable professions.
sentences.cn: 对于一切尊贵职业荣誉可以说是报酬的大部分.
然而，他们的初衷是高尚的。

sentences.en: I believe he was an honourable man, dedicated to the people and his union.
sentences.cn: 我认为他是个品行高洁的人，一心奉献于人民和工会的事业。

sentences.en: I don't think I am worthy of such an honourable title.
sentences.cn: 这样的光荣称号,我可担当不起.

sentences.en: My father didn’t think acting was an honorable profession.
sentences.cn: 我父亲认为当演员不是受人尊敬的职业。

sentences.en: The honourable lady must know that this is a tax on employers.
sentences.cn: 这位尊敬的女士必须知道这是一种向雇主征收的税.

sentences.en: The leader has said that all branches are equally honourable.
sentences.cn: 领袖曾说过,一切部门的工作人员都是同样值得尊敬的.

sentences.en: These businessmen are both competitive and honourable.
sentences.cn: 这些商人既有竞争性又很诚实.

sentences.en: 长期而光荣的从政生涯
sentences.cn: 长期而光荣的从政生涯

words.tran_cn: 荣誉的；名誉的；道义上的
受尊敬的；已承兑或付款的
名誉学位；获名誉学位者；名誉团体
尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据
荣誉的；值得尊敬的；表示尊敬的；正直的

trans.tran_cn: 诚实的，正直的，光荣的，荣耀的，尊敬的，高尚的
trans.tran_en: an honourable action or activity deserves respect and admiration
